### ACID:

| Property | Meaning |
|----------|--------|
| **Atomicity** | All or nothing |
| **Consistency** | Valid state transitions |
| **Isolation** | Transactions don't interfere |
| **Durability** | Committed = permanent |

### Isolation Levels:

| Level | Prevents |
|-------|----------|
| Read Uncommitted | Nothing |
| Read Committed | Dirty reads |
| Repeatable Read | + Non-repeatable |
| Serializable | + Phantom reads |

### Lock Types:

| Lock | Allows |
|------|--------|
| **Shared (S)** | Multiple readers |
| **Exclusive (X)** | Single writer |

### Deadlock: Circular waiting

### Concurrency Issues:

| Issue | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| Dirty read | Read uncommitted data |
| Non-repeatable | Different reads in same tx |
| Phantom | New rows appear |
| Lost update | Overwrite concurrent change |
